name: The Froject
description:
Collect frogs around the room by using the items that you have access to. Each frog has its own costume, collect them all!

Controls:

Mouse (Left Click) to select and drag

Team Members: 

  • Thomas Buckley: Director & Programmer
  • Billy Smith: Director & Programmer
  • Alfie Johnson: Level Design & Programmer
  • Lily Paston: Character Design
  • Molly Hallett: User Interface Design
  • Ryan Evans: Asset Design 

NOTES:  game is in development so some features are not fully polished as this was a game jam in an educational environment.
